name: asd-project
description: The project uses a firebase database as well as Jest unit testing to control and manage the website. The project simulates a simple copy of Amazon's website. Contributors:  - Vinsensius Kelvin Wang : Registration and Website Framework (Database)  - Vishu Singh : Item Cart and Home Page  - Christopher L. Chang : Login and Edit Details  - Jeyden Johnson: Item management  - Kennedy Asa-Vongxay: Administrator management
